Package gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.workers

This package contains base implementations for Worker types declared in the architecture packages.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractBaseWorker Base class for worker implementations.
AbstractCacheLoaderOperation<C extends Comparable<? super C>> Deprecated. Use AbstractCacheLoaderOperation instead.
AbstractOperation Basic implementation of Operation.
AbstractPersistenceOperation<P extends PersistentObject<?>> Abstract persistence operation.
AbstractPoOperation<P extends PersistentObject<?>> AbstractPoOperation is an operation that is relevant with one PersistentObject.
AbstractPoValidator<P extends PersistentObject<?>> Base class for Persistent object validators.
AbstractResourceConsumer Resource consumer that knows the name of its resource wrapper manager.
AbstractTransformation<A,R> Abstract base class for implementations of Transformation that must also be Workers.
ArrayIteratorQuery<T> Adapts an array to a query.
ConditionValidator<T> Validates an object against a condition.
CriteriaQueryWrapperQuestion<T,C> CriteriaDependent question that wraps an EntitiesQuery.
FactorySupportedFastPoReader<K extends Serializable & Comparable<? super K>,P extends PersistentObject<K>> Implementation of FastPoReader.
IteratorQuery<T> Adapts an array to a query.
PoBeforeUpdateValidator<P extends PersistentObject<?>> Rule that performs validations on a PersistentObject in the unit of work that will ultimately update the persistent object in the data layer.
PwWrapperQuery<P extends PersistentObject<K>,K extends Serializable & Comparable<? super K>> Wrapper query around a persistence worker.
QueryWrapperQuestion<T> QueryWrapperQuestion is a question backed by an EntitiesQuery.
The answer is a list that contains the entities fetched by the query.
SequentialOperation SequentialOperation executes a sequence of Operation objects.
StandAloneWorker A dummy worker is a worker that has a worker interface, however it doesn't really need any resources.
TransformedQuery<F,T> Query that wraps another query and transforms the entities fetched by the wrapped query using a transformation.
WorkerUtils Utilities relevant with Worker objects.
 

Package gr.interamerican.bo2.impl.open.workers Description

This package contains base implementations for Worker types declared in the architecture packages.
